alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 1:40PM MST until November 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 7500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. This includes Mount Baldy. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 AM Saturday: Alpine 1 to 2 inches Pinetop-Lkside 0 to 1 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
